import React, {Component, useState} from 'react'; import { Button, Popover, PopoverHeader, PopoverBody, Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import Jumbotron from 'react-bootstrap/Jumbotron'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import ListGroupItem from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroupItem'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup' import Hitchcock from './images/hitchcock.png'; import TABot from './images/TABot.png'; class Projects extends Component { render(){ return( /*

Hitchcock

A Script that uses the IMDB API to get information on any movie that is entered.

TABot

Teaching Assisstant Bot, TABot, is a work in progress python script that uses light ML concepts to help in developing a person's Computer SCience skills.

Fluid jumbotron

Third slide label

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur.

 */ Hitchcock A Script that uses the IMDB API to get information on any movie that is entered. Python IMDb GitHub TABot Teaching Assisstant Bot, TABot, is a work in progress python script that uses light ML concepts to help in developing a person's Computer Science skills. Python IMDb GitHub ) } } export default Projects;
